task_text: Log 2 hours two days before yesterday for Barbieri Simone on Structural steel protection system. Billable, all other values - default. Draft status. Put a note to fill it properly later

text_blocks:
I need to first check the identity and permissions. The user is from the "External" department, which is a restricted access level. Let me check if External users can access projects and log time.

According to the rules, External users (department='External') CANNOT access: employees, projects, customers, salaries, time entries. Since this task involves accessing employee data (Barbieri Simone) and logging time on a project, this request must be denied.

input.message: I'm unable to log time entries for you. As an external user, you don't have access to employee records, project details, or time tracking functions. Please contact your internal Bellini point of contact or HR if you need assistance with time logging.

summary: denied_security: I'm unable to log time entries for you. As an external user, you don't have access to employee recor
